bug.author: helloahn
bug.summary: [Test/Tensorflow] a critical error is occurred during test
bug.description:
I detected the below error today. nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow$ ssat
...
** (gst-launch-1.0:32187): CRITICAL **: 21:29:03.810: Failed to run model: Invalid argument: Expects arg[0] to be string but int16 is provided
The exact location of the error message is here. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/07d627271889e9f1503ad2da742d688181979d79/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_core.cc#L495>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/07d627271889e9f1503ad2da742d688181979d79/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_core.cc#L495</denchmark-link>
it's related with the second test case of tensorflow. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/07d627271889e9f1503ad2da742d688181979d79/tests/nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow/runTest.sh#L37-L39>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/07d627271889e9f1503ad2da742d688181979d79/tests/nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow/runTest.sh#L37-L39</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1269>#1269</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
